attributes.action: Cancel the current CRB Check system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: following the case in plymouth, it is patently obvious that the crb check, although well meaning, is a pointless excercise, but one that has the effect of creating a misplaced sense of security for parents with young children. any undetected paedophile is happily given access to young children because they have this piece of paper.
